speaker: BUSH
sentence: Because today in America, a third of our kids, after we spend more per student than any country in the world other than a couple rounding errors, to be honest with you, 30 percent are college- and/or career-ready.

verified_claim_article_title: 70 of Americans don't have college degree, Rick Santorum says

speaker: BAIER
